mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.skill_level AS "skillLevel", a.location_city AS "locationCity", a.project_length AS "projectLength", a.start_date AS "startDate", a.out_source AS "outSource", a.delivery_mode AS "deliveryMode", a.govt_clearnce AS "govtClearnce", a.notes AS "notes", a.form_status As "formStatus", a.submitter AS "submitter", a.is_book AS "isBook", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.book_user_id AS "bookUserId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yg_consultant( skill_level, location_city, project_length, start_date, out_source, delivery_mode, govt_clearnce, notes, form_status, submitter, is_book, create_date, book_user_id ) VALUES ( #{skillLevel}, #{locationCity}, #{projectLength}, #{startDate}, #{outSource}, #{deliveryMode}, #{govtClearnce}, #{notes}, #{formStatus}, #{submitter}, #{isBook}, #{createDate}, #{bookUserId} )
